basics.name: Rodrigo Frende
basics.label: Front End Developer | UI/UX Focused
basics.summary: Frontend developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable and responsive applications using Vue.js, Vite, and Tailwind. Passionate about UI/UX design, 3D printing, and side projects that blend creativity and technology.

work.name: KIU System Solutions
work.summary: Working on internal design systems and applications for the travel and aviation industry.
highlights: Developed and maintained UI components using Vue 3, Tailwind, and Storybook
Improved consistency and scalability by integrating Material Design specifications
Participated in unit testing, CI/CD processes and Gitlab workflows

work.name: Striano
work.summary: Led frontend development for various projects across industries including e-commerce, fintech, and logistics.
highlights: Implemented responsive user interfaces with Vue, React, and Bootstrap
Handled complete development cycles from planning to deployment
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and supported backend integration

work.name: Consensus
work.summary: Entered the tech industry as a trainee and evolved into a proficient full-stack developer.
highlights: Worked on multiple client-facing projects using JavaScript and Java
Gained hands-on experience with databases, APIs, and deployment pipelines
Quick learning curve and strong mentorship experience

projects.name: PokéPalette
projects.description: A creative tool that generates color palettes based on Pokémon images using color-thief and the PokéAPI.
highlights: Extracted dominant colors from Pokémon sprites
Export palette as Figma-compatible tokens or CSS variables
